        Parameters:
        account_id - is id of new user account.
        user_name - is name of new user account.

        birth_date - is birthdate of new user account.

      • find_index_account

        public int find_index_account​(Account[] user_accounts,
                              java.lang.String user_name)
        It finds the index of the account that has the same user_name as the user_name pareameter passed to the function.
        Parameters:
        user_accounts - all created users are stored in this array, which is passed as a parameter.
        user_name - it holds the username of the user we are searching for in user_accounts.

      • find_post_index

        public int find_post_index​(Account user_account,
                           int post_id)
        It finds the index of the post that has the same post_id as the post_id pareameter passed to the function.
        Parameters:
        user_account - It holds the Account object of the user whose posts we are searching for.
        post_id - It holds the post_id value of the post we are searching for.

        Parameters:

        public void send_message​(Account[] user_accounts,
                         java.lang.String user_name,
                         long message_id,
                         java.lang.String message_content)
        Allows us to send a message to a user
        Parameters:
        user_accounts - all created users are stored in this array, which is passed as a parameter.
        user_name - the username of the user we want to send a message to
        message_id - message ID number for the message we will send
        message_content - the content of the message we want to send.
